name: Kirby's Galactic Shootout
description:
Originally Created: October 14th, 2021.

Note: It is recommended you play in "Ultra" Graphic Settings, the game does not appear to be taxing on most devices.

Play as Kirby through 3 levels as you shoot at Dark Matter to aim for the Goal-Score! You can just shoot the enemies OR you can use your suction ability and shoot them back out for even more points!

This is my second Unity game!
